comment.author: 25438769@N07
comment._content:
Hellen Keller for real!!
Is this the faous Hellen Keller in the book and movie?

comment.author: 79805426@N00
comment._content: She stands out like a star in this picture because she's able to be so much more natural than the others.  She didn't have a preconception of how someone should hold their face for a photo so she just WAS.  Lovely.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Mrs. Macy (Anne Sullivan Macy) was tutor and companion to Helen Keller. See en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anne_Sullivan

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Disability History, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
